SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.view.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.view.UI
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.view.GUI.GUI
public class GUI extends UI
GUI class responsible for managing user interface interactions and displaying game views. Extends UI to implement specific UI-related methods.
